content.name: Number of Climate Laws and Policies
content.legend_description: The size of the circle represents the number of climate laws and policies. The larger the circle, the higher the number of climate laws and policies.

content.name: Number of Litigation Cases
content.legend_description: The size of the circle represents the number of climate lawsuits. The larger the circle, the higher the number of climate lawsuits.

context.name: Country Greenhouse Gas Emissions Data (CAIT 2016) (MtCO2e)
context.legend_description: The colour of the circle represents Carbon dioxide emissions from the use of fossil fuel and the manufacture of cement, land-use change, and forestry (MtCO2e). The darker the circle, the higher the emissions.

context.name: Country Greenhouse Gas Emissions Data (CAIT 2016) (per cent of global emissions)
context.legend_description: The colour of the circle represents the percentage of Carbon dioxide emissions from the use of fossil fuel and the manufacture of cement, land-use change, and forestry (%). The darker the circle, the higher the emissions.

context.name: Global Climate Risk Index 1999-2018 (no units)
context.legend_description: The colour of the circle represents the global climate risk index (CRI, no units). The darker the circle, the higher the level of exposure and vulnerability to extreme weather events.
